q1: Will Barcelona win La Liga this year?
a1: There is a good chance and i hope they do.
q2: How much did Barcelona pay for its most expensive player?
q3: And has it been a good investment?
a3: It is too early to tell. However they needed a replacement for Iniesta and Coutinho was a great choice. However he has big boots to fill.
q4: Do Barcelona have too much money?
a4: All European clubs have a great deal of money at their disposal, or at least the premier league ones
